references.reason: This paper introduces Neural ODEs (NODEs), the foundation upon which the current work builds and introduces improvements.
This paper introduces a significant variation of NODEs, providing a comparison point for the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Neural controlled differential equations for irregular time series
references.reason: This paper addresses irregular time series, a limitation of NODEs that the authors seek to address with their proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), providing a comparison point for the proposed approach that also incorporates physical information.
This paper introduces Graph Neural ODEs (GNODEs), another important variation that enables modelling on graphs, which shows a different extension of NODEs than the approach proposed in the paper.
